job_title: Manager of Student Accounts and Collections in Whiting, IN
pros:
College-family environment.
Great vacation and benefits package.
Growth Opportunities.
Excellent institution for public service.
College qualifies for Public Service Loan Forgiveness program through U.S. Dept. of Education.
cons: There are no cons to working at Calumet College of St. Joseph, in fact, it is a great institution for public service and social justice.

pros: Great, easy to work with professors

job_title: Adjunct Professor and Tutor in Whiting, IN
pros:
Friendly administration and department heads
A great deal of freedom over what you teach in your classes
cons: As with all adjunct positions, you can be let go at any time and for any reason, the compensation isn't great and does not make up for all of the unpaid hours of work outside the classroom, and the faculty are often so busy that getting solid feedback on your classes is hard to come by.

review_title: Loved the people i met along the way
pros: Awesome co-workers! Very family like among friends.
cons: Poor financial management, yearly downsizing, unqualified persons to high positions. Constant fear if your job title will be eliminated.

pros: They have a very friendly environment

job_title: Business Office Manager in Whiting, IN
pros:
Great work experience
Great place to build work relationships
cons:
No raises 
Continuous budget cuts 
Inconsistent work environment
